SHELL #; here goes interactive entry set pattern=##class(%Regex.Matcher).%New("\b[^ ]+\b|\""([^\""]+)\""") for { write !,"CPM>> " read line set line=$zstrip(line,"<>WC")
kill args set args=0 set pattern.Text=line while pattern.Locate() { set args($increment(args))=$zstrip(pattern.Group,"<>WCP") }
continue:args=0 set command=args(1) set command=$zconvert(command,"U")
quit:command="QUIT" quit:command="Q"
if $text(@command)="" { write !,"Unrecognized command: ",command,! continue } try { do @command } catch { write !,"Error occured: ",$zerror } } quit BATCH(args...) ; here goes batch entry quit COMMANDS INSTALL(args...) ;;install package quit LIST(args...) ;;list of installed packages quit HELP(args...) ;;this help write !,"Cache Package Manager" write !!,"Available commands:" for i=1:1 { set line=$text(COMMANDS+i) quit:line=""
continue:$zstrip($extract(line),"*WCP")="" set help=$piece(line,";;",2) continue:help="" set command=$zcvt($piece(line,"("),"L") write !?3,command,?15,help } w !?3,"quit",?15,"quit from shell" w ! quit
